data.title: Independent Talent
data.meta_description: With over a decade’s production and development experience in scripted television and feature film, Camilla is a motivated and ambitious...
data.text: With over a decade’s production and development experience in scripted television and feature film, Camilla is a motivated and ambitious Producer, with strong script and development experience. Camilla is currently developing high-class film and TV projects through her BFI Vision Award and BBC Small Indie Fund backed company Other Productions, and was selected as one of 2020’s Edinburgh TV festival ONES TO WATCH. During her career, Camilla has gained experience seeing drama and feature projects through from conception to delivery. Staring her career in television drama production, she also has experience working in development for leading film body the British Film Institute, on studio scale feature projects for award winning director David Yates, as well as providing freelance script consultant services for A-list writers and directors.
